text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API and Launch Error Rates>
We are investigating increased API and launch error rates in a single Availability Zone in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API and Launch Error Rates>
Between 5:06 AM and 5:50 AM PST we experienced elevated error rates for instance related APIs and new instance launches in a single Availability Zone in the US-EAST-1 Region. Existing instances were not affected. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 5:15 PM and 5:55 PM PST, we experienced intermittent increased error rates for a subset of requests made to the Amazon S3 APIs in the US-EAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
